title: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Historical Photos   18 Photos  Original photographs of the characters involved in the 1868 battle.          Landscapes   11 Photos  Photographs of the battlesite and the Cultural Heritage Center today.           Nature   12 Photos  Nature at the Washita            Kids' Programs   7 Photos  Activities and Programs available for kids at Washita Battlefield.          Events   6 Photos  Special Events at the Washita Battlefield National Historic Site          Wildflowers   12 Photos  The many different wildflowers of Washita.
